data.title: '05 Detroit Pistons Roster
meta_keywords: '04-'05 Detroit Pistons Roster - w/ 2K Share download
data.meta_description: Hey guys. I know some of you know the great Detroit team from the '03-'04 season? Some of you don't know. Probably because it was almost 10 years ago.
data.text:
Rookie

OVR: 5

Join Date: Jan 2013

Location: Philippines

'04-'05 Detroit Pistons Roster - w/ 2K Share download

Hey guys.

I know some of you know the great Detroit team from the '03-'04 season?

Some of you don't know. Probably because it was almost 10 years ago.

See, the 'greatest' Detroit roster was when they won the NBA championship the season Rasheed Wallace joined the team.

But since 2K has not created a few cyberfaces for some of the retired players like Chucky Atkins or Tremaine Fowlkes. It's sad.

So pretty much, I've thought to create the '04-'05 Detroit Pistons roster (12 players in all, all players have cyberfaces.)

Remember, this team is only for the PC version in 2K Share.

WARNING:

Player statistics may not be accurate. If you do edit it in a more accurate rating (that is according to the right stats of that player in that specific season) please PM me or reply to this thread with the statistics changes. Thanks guys!

Roster

Carlos Arroyo

Chauncey Billups (I used the old Chauncey)

Elden Campbell

Carlos Delfino (I don't know if 2K made a cyberface for the young Delfino, so I used the old Delfino cyberface.)

Ronald Dupree (I got this as an SF from Free Agency.)

Darvin Ham

Richard Hamilton (I used the old Rip Hamilton.)

Lindsey Hunter

Antonio McDyess (Sorry, I used the old McDyess face.)

Darko Milicic (used the old Darko guys. Haha.)

Tayshaun Prince (the old Tayshaun)

Ben Wallace (Luckily, 2K made a young Ben Wallace w/ afro. Be proud.)

Rasheed Wallace (Of course, Sheed's Knicks cyberface.)

I'll try to update if there is more.

Special Thanks to:

Medevenx's Ultimate Roster 0.6

-Thanks to Med for putting the Create a Team logos (replacing logos 1-10 with the Trail Blazers, Wizards, Raptors, Bucks, Knicks, etc.) and gave me an idea to come up with this roster. *This link goes to the 0.8 roster preview*

Seriously guys. If it wasn't for Med's Ultimate roster, this wasn't ever going to happen.

Google

-This might seem childish but yeah. Google for providing the rosters! :O

Warning: I'll try to update Ben Wallace. He's got 'white-boy' legs. Haha. Sorry 'bout that.
